pkmkdoc.description: Wcalc is a command-line arbitrary-precision calculator designed to accept all valid mathematical expressions. It supports all standard mathematical operations, parenthesis, brackets, hexadecimal, octal, binary, decimal, trigonometric functions, inverse trigonometric functions, hyperbolic and inverse hyperbolic trigonometric functions, logs, bitshifts, implicit multiplication, and most boolean operators, as well as unit conversions and the ability to save the history of expressions and variables.
